--- alter_table_rename_to.sql
ALTER TABLE Singers RENAME TO SingersNew
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 19,
    Name:    "Singers",
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.RenameTo{
    Rename: 20,
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 30,
      NameEnd: 40,
      Name:    "SingersNew",
    },
    AddSynonym: (*ast.AddSynonym)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE Singers RENAME TO SingersNew
